channel.title: Help!
channel.description:
Ok i was playing on my silabs server, im using the source czar, ok anyway this guy got on and said he wanted to talk in private so im like ok then he says make me admin or ill crash ur server, i didnt think he could do that so im like sure go ahead. Then all of a sudden i see in the chat box "Admin: Purez banned puppy", he says I can ban, im like wtf then he bans me! So i had to take server down, i unbanned myself, deleted his account, and pasted his ip in "bannedips".
How was he able to ban if he wasnt admin??? And on my server the ip banner doesnt really work so can someone help me and give me a good ip banner.
And how do i ban him if he gets back on, i type ::banuser purez but it doesnt work, nothing happens.

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

There’s about 5 usernames that are not changed in the original that are admin etc

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Phree_xp Phree xp
item.description:
@Phree_xp wrote:

Skiller, you are an idiot.

All it is, it that name is able to banned on all servers leeched from Czar.

Read full topic

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @lolplz lolplz
item.description:
@lolplz wrote:

That’s not crashing. Search banuser in client.java, and take out all the usernames that follow after it. He’s just using names put into the brackets.

Read full topic
